feature.label: VEditor
feature.description: VEditor is a Verilog/VHDL editor for the Eclipse IDE. It provides Verilog(IEEE-1364) and VHDL language specific code viewer, contents outline, code assist etc. It helps coding and debugging in hardware development based on Verilog or VHDL.
